title: Grotesque ID please
content:
Could you please id the font on this poster?

Thanks in advance  
Costas

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190114im_/http:/typophile.com/files/info_01_5999.jpg)

 [‹ Script - from an apple box](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190114/http:/typophile.com/node/46253 "Go to previous forum topic") [Guess these fonts and WIN! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080612190114/http:/typophile.com/node/46244 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Cubic_DS

comments.content:
I think this may be hand-drawn. Despite it’s overall uniformity, there are some minor inconsistencies (unless the backgrounds are messing with me), there are few to no kerning pairs to speak of, and the “O”s and “U”s do not extend past the baseline or the capheight.

It’s likely based on some geometric that I don’t recognize, but I can’t help beyond that.

Anyone else?

Good luck!
